name: Animal Party!
description:
Welcome to Animal Village, a completely empty and desolate plot of land that you have recently become the mayor of! Your sister is planning on celebrating her birthday there, but you need to build back the town first!! So get resources, hire villagers, and buy buildings to reach 10,000 points before you run out of time. 

Controls: WASD or Arrows to move

If you're on a resource, click anywhere to harvest it

Escape = pause.

----map----

center: main town

up: mine

left: farm

right: forest

down: extra plot for buildings

Please enjoy! My 2nd game jam game. :D

...don't ask about why the beavers are so big.

also, there are a lot of janky parts, but you try making a game in a week!...you did, didn't you. It's better than this one, isn't it. XD
